mosinstall.name: p9939068 Ajax CB Connections (free version)
mosinstall.author: Mike Feng
mosinstall.description:
An AJAX based module that displays a user's Community Builder connections.
IMPORTANT! This module requires Community Builder (CB) to work!
Download and install CB from Joomlapolis first!

For more information on the full commercial version, go to http://mike.simbunch.com.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: name_type
param.label: Type of name to display
param.description: Select whether to output name or username of connections.

param.name: num_column
param.label: Columns
param.description: Number of columns in a row. Make sure the number fits your module width.

param.name: no_photo_img
param.label: No Photo Img
param.description: Picture to display if connection has no avatar. Defaults to CB's No-Photo image.

param.name: avatar_dimension
param.label: Avatar Dimension
param.description: Width and Height of the square box containing the avatar (in pixels).
